title: Bloomberg Markets: Ahern on Xi's Outlook for China
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Ahern on Xi's Outlook for China
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Brendan Edward Ahern\u0010Chief Investment Officer\u0010Krane Fund Advisors LLC\u0010Discussing China's communist party summit and President Xi Jinping's warning of “severe” challenges for the country.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
